subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|宀|奇|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=house}} ― living away from home.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[entrust]] (with a [[task]])
# to [[depend]] on; to [[adhere]] to
# to [[live]] away from [[home]]
# to [[place]] ([[temporarily]]); to [[put]]; to [[deposit]]
# to [[express]] or [[convey]] (one's [[feeling]]s) through a [[medium]], such as the thing one [[describe]]s, [[compose]]s or [[paint]]s
# to [[transmit]] (an [[item]]) on [[behalf]] of another person; to [[send]] (now chiefly through [[mail]]s); to [[post]]
# to [[use]] [[temporarily]]; to [[borrow]]
# to [[grant]]; to [[gift]]; to [[bestow]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[government]] [[official]] in charge of [[translating]] from and into the [[speech]] of non-[[Chinese]] [[ethnic group]]s in China's [[east]] (''{{w|Dongyi}}'')
# {{lb|zh|historical}} to [[send]] [[criminal]]s into [[exile]] to the [[remote]] [[area]]s in the [[east]], as a [[form]] of [[punishment]]
# {{lb|zh|of a [[relative]]}} not [[biological]]; [[adopted]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} an alternate name used for the Dongyi tribes during the Ming Dynasty
